statements: SELECT * FROM reports_dashboards;
SELECT report_name, report_type FROM reports_dashboards WHERE report_id = '123456-7890';
SELECT report_name, dashboard_id FROM reports_dashboards WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_type, dashboard_id, created_at FROM reports_dashboards ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports_dashboards WHERE report_type = 'Sales' AND dashboard_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM reports_dashboards WHERE report_type = 'financial';
SELECT * FROM reports_dashboards WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_name, dashboard_id FROM reports_dashboards ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT report_type FROM reports_dashboards;
SELECT report_id, report_name, created_at FROM reports_dashboards WHERE dashboard_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM sales_reports ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT salesperson_name, sales_amount FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT report_name, created_date, last_updated FROM sales_reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%Q1%';
SELECT * FROM sales_reports ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM sales_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT salesperson_name, sales_amount FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports INNER JOIN sales_performance ON sales_reports.report_id = sales_performance.sales_id;
SELECT report_id, report_name, salesperson_name, sales_amount FROM sales_reports, sales_performance WHERE sales_reports.report_id = 1 AND sales_performance.sales_id = 1 AND sales_amount = 2500;
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT id, sales_amount FROM SalesMetrics WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM CustomReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, product_id, performance_score FROM PerformanceIndicators WHERE performance_score < 0.5
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics JOIN PerformanceIndicators ON SalesMetrics.id = PerformanceIndicators.id
SELECT id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM SalesMetrics WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PerformanceIndicators WHERE performance_score >= 0.8 AND employee_id = 101 ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM CustomReports WHERE DATE(report_date) = '2022-05-15' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics ORDER BY sales_amount ASC, sales_date DESC
SELECT report_name, SUBSTRING(report_content, 1, 50) AS short_content FROM CustomReports WHERE LENGTH(report_content) > 100
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_name, creator_id, created_date FROM reports ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC, sales_amount ASC
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE creator_id = 1001
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM products INNER JOIN sales_data ON products.product_id = sales_data.product_id ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_id, quantity, revenue FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_id, quantity, revenue FROM SalesData WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT total_amount, customer_id, date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount >= 1000 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT SUM(value) AS total_value, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
